entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
